sentences.en: A demo of Agorithm complete source code can be used directly.
sentences.cn: 戈登的演示算法完整的源代码可以直接使用.

sentences.en: All of the above we completed have been elected demo projects.
sentences.cn: 这些工程均被评为样板工程.

sentences.en: DEMO also achieving the Billboard, motion blur, function.
sentences.cn: 同时DEMO还实现了Billboard, 运动模糊, 的功能.

sentences.en: Demo videos look great and colours are vibrant and clear.
sentences.cn: 演示影片期待伟大和颜色都是充满活力的和明确的.

sentences.en: GPS system in Geographic Information System GPS Vehicle creation of the icon DEMO code!
sentences.cn: GPS系统中在地理信息系统里创建GPS车辆图标的DEMO代码!

sentences.en: He listened to one of my demo tapes.
sentences.cn: 他听了我的一盘录音样带。

sentences.en: Maintain all Demo equipment in proper order.
sentences.cn: 保持所有DEMO仪器在正常工作状态.

sentences.en: Q: Where can I see a demo of the simulations?
sentences.cn: 问: 在哪里能看到模拟仿真题的演示?

sentences.en: Raw video storage directory is used to test the Demo Video, YUV format.
sentences.cn: 原始视频目录中存放的是用于测试用的Demo视频, YUV格式.

sentences.en: See the video demo: using the layer masking " . "
sentences.cn: 请参阅《视频示范: 搁置图层蒙版 》.

sentences.en: Send us a demo with one or two of your best songs.
sentences.cn: 把你最好的一两首歌的小样寄给我们。

sentences.en: Steve: What did they say? Do you like your demo?
sentences.cn: 史迪夫: 他们说些什么? 你自己认为你们的样带 怎么样 ?

sentences.en: The following demo shows how to redirect a user mode notepad debugging session into kernel.
sentences.cn: 下面的demo演示了如何把notepad的调试冲定向到核心态.

sentences.en: The source code zip file contains the source code and GPSLIB Library Demo program.
sentences.cn: 源代码压缩文件中包含有GPSLIB库的源代码和Demo程序.

sentences.en: This concludes the demo of the Preinstallation Kit Wizard.
sentences.cn: 该操作将结束预安装库向导的演示.
